message.content:
The given lineage relationships establish a directed path from Kenneth to Natalie through a series of ancestor-descendant connections. Specifically, Kenneth is an ancestor of Sarah, who is an ancestor of Kevin, and so on through multiple generations until reaching David, who is an ancestor of Natalie. Therefore, Natalie is a descendant of Kenneth.

<ANSWER>2</ANSWER>
